entry.title: Monday: A few showers. High 13.

entry.title: Monday night: A few showers. Low 8.
entry.summary: A few showers ending this evening then cloudy. Fog patches developing overnight. Low 8. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Monday 8 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers in the afternoon with risk of a thunderstorm. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. High 20. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Monday 8 May 2023
